channel.title: Need help with client.java and compile.bat (PEEPS WHO NOW ABOUT IT ONLY)
channel.description:
Ok guys listen up:
1.i put codes in client.java: for talking NPC's, Mod_island and much more... 2.i press compile.bat, it gives me this message:
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Press any key to continue. . .
(i think this is a normal message)
3.i press runserver, and it works perfect... 4.i log into moparscape and use my no-ip, it works perfect 5.i search the talking NPC's and press the code for going to mod_island and much more... [b]6.everything that i searched for, and putted in client.java, shops, items,... isn't in my server...[/b]
now the [b]BIG[/b] question is:
[b][u]WTF AM I DOING ************* WRONG?[/u][/b]

item.title: Need help with client.java and compile.bat (PEEPS WHO NOW ABOUT IT ONLY)
item.dc:creator: @oh_yeah oh yeah
item.description:
@oh_yeah wrote:

Ok guys listen up:

1.i put codes in client.java: for talking NPC’s, Mod_island and much more…
2.i press compile.bat, it gives me this message:

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server
Press any key to continue. . .

(i think this is a normal message)

3.i press runserver, and it works perfect…
4.i log into moparscape and use my no-ip, it works perfect
5.i search the talking NPC’s and press the code for going to mod_island and much more…
6.everything that i searched for, and putted in client.java, shops, items,… isn’t in my server…

now the BIG question is:

WTF AM I DOING ************* WRONG?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with client.java and compile.bat (PEEPS WHO NOW ABOUT IT ONLY)
